import React from "react"; import Card from "react-bootstrap/Card"; import { ImPointRight } from "react-icons/im"; function AboutCard() { return (

Hello, I am Pratik Hotchandani from Boston, MA, USA.
I am a graduate student pursuing an MS in Data Science at Northeastern University. Expected graduation May 2025. Additionally, I am currently employed as a software developer at Juspay.

Apart from coding, some other activities that I love to do!

  • Playing Games
  • Writing Tech Blogs
  • Travelling
); } export default AboutCard;
